bug.short_desc: Spurious ENABLED responses in reply to SELECT

long_desc.thetext:
It seems that Cyrus occasionally sends extra unsolicited ENABLED responses to the clients when they select mailboxes using the QRESYNC extension. Trojita already contains special code to filter out these * ENABLED responses when they mention QRESYNC or CONDSTORE, but one of the bugreports we got mentions that Cyrus would occasionally send an empty "* ENABLED\r\n" as well:
19:10:45.964 >>> y19 SELECT AAA (QRESYNC (1415390286 96 (21,32,38,41 21,32,38,41)))␍␊
19:10:45.976 <<< * ENABLED␍␊
Full protocol logs are available at:
https://bugs.kde.org/show_bug.cgi?id=350006 (empty ENABLED) https://bugs.kde.org/show_bug.cgi?id=329204 (extra ENABLED)

https://issues.kolab.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2708
